text: Idris Muhammad (; born Leo Morris; November 13, 1939 â€“ July 29, 2014) was an American jazz drummer who recorded a lot of music with many artists including Ahmad Jamal, Grant Green, Grover Washington, Hank Crawford, Gene Ammons, and Houston Person. Muhammad died in New Orleans, Louisiana. He was 74.Obituary in Times Picayune ==References== ==Other websites== * Interview in Allaboutjazz * Artist and album page of Lipstick Records Category:1939 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American jazz musicians Category:American drummers Category:Musicians from New Orleans
